description: (09NF) Sycamore - Prune lateral growth from building by 1-2m to appropriate growth points to clear and lift crown to 3m from ground level.(09NG) Walnut - Prune lateral growth from building by 1-2m to appropriate growth points to clear, prune branches to nearest appropriate growth points to adequately clear telephone cables.(09NH) Sycamore - Crown lift to 3m from ground level and fell self sown elder adjacent to base of tree encroaching towards footpath.(09NJ, 09NK & 09NL) Sycamore x3 -  Prune lateral growth from building by 1-2m to appropriate growth points to clear.(09NM) Walnut - Prune lateral growth from building by 1-2m to appropriate growth points to clear & lift crown to 3m from ground level.(09NP) Acer sp. - Lift crown to 3m from ground level and prune branches to closest appropriate growth points to adequately clear lamp column for light dispersal.(09NQ) Lime - Lift crown to 3m from ground level.(09NS) Acer sp. -Prune lateral growth from building by 1-2m to appropriate growth points to clear & lift crown to 3m from ground level.(09NT) Prunus sp. - Prune lateral growth from building by 1-2m to appropriate growth points to clear & lift crown to 3m from ground level.(09NU) Acer sp. - Lift crown to 3m from ground levelSEE ATTACHED PLAN FOR TREE SPECIFICATIONS
